item.description:
a new surf-inspired fitness class is launching at BAC from Nov 7th to the 19th! they use a brand new Cardio & Resistance trainer called the RipSurferX to train balance, strength, agility, endurance and power. awesome way to get in shape for surfing and just have fun working out for a change!

you don't have to be a member of BAC to buy tickets, they are $25 per person.

there are a bunch of different class times- nights, afternoons and saturday classes, but Monday night would be fun to go out for a drink after.

check out the website: http://www.surfsetfit...
item.name: SurfSET Fitness classes at BAC
